info.name: Manager Attendance Dashboard API
info.description:
Manager dashboard API for viewing all employees' attendance overview.

Features:
- Overview statistics (total, present, checked out, attendance rate)
- Complete employee attendance list
- Today's status for each employee
- This week attendance summary

Perfect for manager dashboard UI.

request.description:
Get complete attendance dashboard for all employees.

Returns:
1. Overview Statistics:
   - Total employees
   - Present today
   - Checked out
   - Attendance rate %

2. Employee Attendance List:
   - Name, Department, Role
   - Today's status (present/absent/checked_out)
   - Check-in/Check-out times
   - Working hours
   - This week attendance

No parameters required - shows all employees.
